altTitles.ja-ro: 叛逆（はんぎゃく）のニジガサキ

altTitles.ja: 反逆のニジガサキ

description.en: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
description.es-la: Las locuras y bizarras jornadas de Nijigasaki, ahora llegan en formato manga. Sigue las rebeldes aventuras de Setsuna Yuki y el Club Escolar Idol de Nijigasaki en Hangyaku no Nijigasaki.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~ Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou suru

altTitles.ja: 救世主《メシア》～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～

altTitles.en: The Savior «Messiah» ~ The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters

altTitles.zh-hk: 救世主《彌賽亞》～現實世界無雙～

description.en: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、その強さ故に処刑された「元」救世主・大和猛。 目を覚ますとそこは、召喚される前に過ごしていた日本だった。 しかし、街では”ゲート”から現れる魔物が暴れ、ハンターと呼ばれる者たちが魔術を用いて戦っていた。 異世界帰りの猛は、力を隠して暮らす事を決めるが――…。

altTitles.ja: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ

altTitles.en: My Girl Friend Is Big & Cute!

altTitles.pt-br: Minha namorada é grande e fofa!

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute!

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 鬼人幻燈抄

altTitles.en: Sword of the Demon Hunter: Kijin Gentosho

description.en: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.

altTitles.ja: 迷宮ブラックカンパニー

description.en: Kinji, who lacks any kind of work ethic, is a layabout in his modern life. One day, he finds himself transported to another world–but not in a grand fantasy of a hero welcomed with open arms. He’s immediately shoved into a terrible job! Now enslaved by an evil mining company in a fantasy world, Kinji’s about to really learn the meaning of hard work!
description.ja: 異世界×ブラック企業!! ダンジョンで生き残れ、社畜戦士。　働きたくない…その思いから努力を重ね、ネオニートとなった男・二ノ宮キンジ。そんな彼が何の因果か異世界に転移、辿り着いたのは“迷宮が職場”のブラック企業だった。雀の涙の低賃金、長大な労働時間、悲惨な労働環境――生き残る為に死ぬほど働く、社畜的ダンジョンファンタジー！
description.ru: Ниномия Кинджи, изо всех сил старавшийся придерживаться своего девиза «Я не хочу работать», был вызван в другой мир и теперь вынужден часами пахать в суровых условиях за низкую зарплату.  ---**Links:**  - [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/pizagasukidesu)

description.en:
Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"
description.es-la: Cha Iseul es una chica que nació en cuna de oro. Dedicaba sus días a entregarse a los placeres de la bebida, el sexo y el despilfarro de dinero, hasta que su madre le quitó la tarjeta de crédito y decidió no darle ni un centavo más. En plena crisis conoce a Kang Sori, una chica de cabello despeinado y aspecto pasado de moda que parece ser todo lo contrario a ella...

altTitles.ja: MUJINA INTO THE DEEP

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

title.en: Sword Art Online: Kiss and Fly

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン キス・アンド・フライ

altTitles.ru: Sword Art Online: Целуй и лети

description.en: A manga adaptation of a collection of SAO side stories that were originally released as limited edition Blu-Ray/DVD bonuses for the first and second seasons of the Sword Art Online anime, as well as a TV special called the Extra Edition.

altTitles.ja: ノ・ゾ・キ・ア・ナ　フルカラー

description.en: Tatsuhiro moved to Tokyo to attend an art school and start his new life. In his new room, there’s a small hole in the wall. At first he can see nothing through the small hole, but one night, through the peeping hole, he saw a girl. That’s how his new life starts.

title.en: The Film Emperor Is Dead Set on Becoming My Backer

altTitles.zh-ro: Yingdi Ta Ying Yao Dang Wo Jin Zhu

description.en: A gold mentalist paparazzi exposes pictures of Lin Chu privately meeting with his sponsor late at night. After getting into a car accident, he entered the body of the center of gossip, Lin Chu. And, his mysterious sponsor is suspected to be the cold and ruthless movie star Li Yu, who doesn't seem to get along with Lin Chu?! What's even more shocking is that it seems Lin Chu... Has more than one sponsor?!

title.en: A Sinner of the Deep Sea

altTitles.ja: アビスアジュールの罪人

description.en: The ocean covers about 70 percent of the earth’s surface—a whole world, yet unknown to humanity…and in its depths a nation, thousands of meters beneath the waves. There, the mermaid Jo has been whiling away her days in peace. But that tranquility is shattered when her friend Ryuu is imprisoned for breaking the gravest of undersea laws: Their existence must be kept hidden from the people above. But why would Ryuu let the secret slip? And who did she tell? The curtain rises on Jo’s adventure to save her friend—and on a story of love…?!
description.pt-br: Por muitos séculos, Tritões e sereias tem vivido nas profundezas do oceano – 4.000 metros abaixo da superfície – onde a humanidade não pode encontrá-los. No entanto, a vida de uma sereia é virada de cabeça para baixo quando sua melhor amiga se apaixona por um humano.

title.en: The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning

altTitles.zh: 末日狠人：开局囤积万亿物资

altTitles.zh-hk: 末日狠人：開局囤積萬億物資

altTitles.zh-ro: Mò Rì Hěn Rén: Kāijú Túnjī Wàn Yì Wùzī
Mo Ri Hen Ren: Kaiju Tunji Wan Yi Wuzi

altTitles.en: Stockpiling in Apocalypse The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning
The Last All-Knowing Man Collected Trillions of Stuff from Day One

description.en: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

altTitles.ja: うみそらかぜに花

description.en:
The sea is clear and the sky is full of stars. Kaname and Ami live in the countryside and are preparing for the school festival. Their relationship is somewhat close despite their clashes...?

A lyrical coming-of-age tale by Masaru Oishi!

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.th: ปริศนาความทรงจำ

altTitles.ja: 氷菓

description.en:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
description.ru: В центре данной истории - литературный клуб в одной школе. Члены этого клуба не просто читают книжки, а пытаются всеми силами раскрыть преступление, которое было совершено 33 года назад. И в этот клуб поступает главный герой по имени Хотаро, хотя поступает он не по собственному желанию, а из-за приказа своей старшей сестры…

title.en: Turning the Mad Dog Into a Genteel Lord

altTitles.ja-ro: Turning a Crazy Dog Into a Young Master

altTitles.ja: 狂犬な彼を貴公子に変えてみせます!

description.en: Diarin, a priestess without any noteworthy family background or connections, always gets the toughest assignments. So when her boss tells her to help Ceres, a war hero, reintegrate into society, she decides to stop being a pushover and get as much as she can out of it, including a juicy promotion. But upon reaching Ceres' manor, she’s greeted by a growling hound instead of a human. Tasked with the impossible job of turning the mad dog into a proper gentleman, she dedicates herself to caring for him. But his unexpected obsession with her was never part of her plan.

After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

altTitles.ja: STOP! 海賊版
海賊版、ダメ、絶対。～「STOP！ 海賊版」漫画描きおろし16作品集～

description.en:
In a world where manga can be enjoyed forever…
Manga culture has been able to blossom thanks to the power of manga lovers.
However, right now, manga is suffering because of piracy.
We need your help.

(Source: [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/))

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Sukima](https://www.sukima.me/book/title/BT0000818522/) | [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/comic/work/=/product_id/BJ428114.html/) | [Kinokuniya](https://www.kinokuniya.co.jp/f/dsg-08-EK-0875859) | [MANGA BANG！](https://manga-bang.com/store/books/a5a970f4-a493-4ab1-a149-27bf6905b0c8) | [mechacomic](https://mechacomic.jp/books/134314) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88979972) (Chapter 1 only)
- Alternative Official English - [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/) (Note: Last page of each chapter is missing) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/p/CCmnZykJFTB/) (Chapter 1)
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAUd8-BxsNuHPZ-dpTTkUhZJrpFqXX1PY) (Note: Order is different)
description.es:
En un mundo donde el manga se puede disfrutar para siempre...
La cultura del manga ha podido florecer gracias al poder de los amantes del manga.
Sin embargo, ahora mismo, el manga está sufriendo a causa de la piratería.
Necesitamos tu ayuda.
description.ja:
いつまでも漫画を楽しめる世の中に 漫画を愛するみなさまの力で
漫画文化は花開きました。
しかし、今、漫画は海賊版に苦しんでいます。
みなさまの力が必要です。
まずは、下の「漫画」を読んでみてください。
漫画の未来を一緒に創りましょう！

title.en: After Transmigrating Into the Book, I Raised the Sickly Side Male Character to Be the Yandere

altTitles.zh: Chuan Shu Hou, Wo Yang De Bing Ruo Nan Pei Cheng Bing Jiaole
穿书后，我养的病弱男配成病娇了

description.en: Jiang Nian likes the book's beautiful men to be courted, he has a long way to life, no love, still died in the book! In the chance of accident, Jiang read to wear books as a man's close maid, facing the poor cubs who have not grown sick, Jiang Jiang read to play her mother's property, love to the end. But I still got my cubs out... ...?

altTitles.es-la: Harén del Fin del Mundo - Fantasía

altTitles.ja: 終末のハーレム ファンタジア

description.en: It's year 998, and the world has been corrupted by darkness. The next head of the small border kingdom of Nagara, Ark, has feelings for his cousin, Aurelia, but a political marriage to the Crown Prince has separated them. In order to get her back, Ark desires immense power, but a mysterious dark elf, Rati, appears in front of him.  In exchange for a promise, she will give him "the power to rule the world." An erotic and dark fantasy begins!
description.ja: 聖暦998年。そこはまもなく終末を迎える闇に蝕まれた世界。辺境の小国ナーガラの次期当主・アルクは従姉のアウレリアと両想いだったが、皇太子との政略結婚のため引き離されてしまった。彼女を取り戻そうと強力な力を欲するアルクの前に現れた謎のダークエルフ・ラティ。ラティからある約束と引き換えに“この世を統べることができる力”を授けると告げられたアルクは――。エロティック＆ダークファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Es el año 998, y el mundo ha sido corrompido por la oscuridad. El próximo jefe del pequeño reino fronterizo de Nagara, Alk, siente algo por su prima Aurelia, pero un matrimonio político con el príncipe heredero los ha separado. Para recuperarla, Alk anhela un inmenso poder, pero la misteriosa elfa oscura Rati aparece ante él.  A cambio de una promesa, ella le dará "el poder de gobernar el mundo". ¡Comienza una fantasía erótica y oscura!

title.en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara

altTitles.ja: ドラマな恋は基本から

altTitles.ja-ro: Drama na Koi ha Kihon kara

altTitles.en: Dramatic Love Starts from the Basics

description.en: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!
description.ja: 「35歳独身、彼女なし、実家暮らし」の平凡なサラリーマン・悠木慎史。独りで生きる未来に不安があるけれど、恋愛経験は少ないし婚活も怖い――。そんな悠木が、とあるアクシデントで医師・伴瑛理子と出会い、人生がひっくり返る「想像以上の恋」に落ちる！ 　大ヒット社会人恋愛漫画『この会社に好きな人がいます』の榎本あかまるが贈る、ミドサーから始める恋愛トレーニング!!

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

altTitles.en: I’m Trapped In A Terrible Drama

description.en:
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?
description.fr: Le personnage principal, qui a grandi en tant qu'orpheline, réalise enfin son rêve d'avoir sa propre maison après de longues épreuves. Cependant, sa joie est de courte durée : alors qu'elle regarde sa série préférée, elle ressent une douleur dans la poitrine et meurt soudainement. Lorsqu'elle rouvre les yeux, elle découvre qu'elle se trouve à l'intérieur du feuilleton qu'elle regardait avant de mourir ! Pire encore, elle s'est réincarnée en Shin Sera, une méchante qui tente de tuer le personnage principal féminin et qui est finalement tuée par le personnage principal masculin !

altTitles.ja: あかいろ交差点

description.en:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
description.es: El timido y amigable Keita trata de mejorar su amistad con Tamaki, que siempre se ha mostrado fria y cruel desde la primera vez que se conocieron. ¿Pero por qué? Keita quiere saber… ¿Será que lo odia? ¿Hizo algo que la lastimó? Eso pensaba Keita, hasta que Tamaki le dijo que podia ver algo especial…

altTitles.en: Kimagure Orange Road - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: きまぐれオレンジ★ロード
きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード
きまぐれオレンジロード
きまぐれオレンジ★ロード カラー版

description.en: KOR is the story of the Kasuga family, but mostly the oldest son, Kyosuke (who narrates), as they move to a new town after being found out to be a family of ESPers. Kyosuke meets a pretty young girl as he counts the "100 steps" (there may only be 99) that lead to his new school and is immediately smitten. However, the pretty young girl, named Ayukawa Madoka has agreed to help her best friend Hiyama Hikaru win Kyosuke. Thus, a love triangle is born.

description.de:
Alle Schurken sind besiegt und die Helden haben die Welt gerettet. Das klingt erst einmal gut, doch sind wirklich alle Helden gut? Nicht alle, die sich „Helden“ nennen, verhalten sich auch so: Eine Frau, deren Schwester von einem dieser „Helden“ getötet wurde, begibt sich auf die Mission, den Täter zu finden, und wird zum „Hero-Killer“, der jede Nacht Jagd auf korrupte Helden macht. Kann sie es schaffen, ihre Schwester zu rächen und die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3403)
description.en:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?
description.es:
El mundo está en constante agitación, con guerras constantes desatándose entre héroes y villanos. Dotada con habilidades extraordinarias, una chica solitaria recorre un camino sangriento de venganza contra las injusticias del mundo en el que vive. Con los enfrentamientos constantes entre los titanes, nadie está a salvo. Si nadie está dispuesto a proteger a los inocentes, ¿quiénes son los verdaderos héroes? ¿Quiénes son los verdaderos villanos? ¿Qué es lo que realmente separa a los unos de los otros?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3422)
description.fr:
Dotée de capacités surnaturelles, Ehwa, une jeune fille solitaire, s'engage sur un chemin sanglant afin de se venger pour sa soeur qui a été tuée par un "héros". Elle ne sait toujours pas qui de ces "héros" est responsable de sa mort, mais cela lui importe peu... car il suffit de les massacrer tous.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3151)
description.hu: A világ állandó kavarodásban van, állandó háborúk törnek ki a Hősök és a Gonoszok között. Természetfölötti képességekkel felruházva egy magányos lány véres útra indul, hogy bosszút álljon a világ igazságtalanságai ellen, amelyben él. Ha senki sem hajlandó megvédeni az ártatlanokat, kik az igazi hősök és kik az igazi gonosztevők? Mi választja el igazán a másikat?
description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, Ehwa kehilangan saudara perempuan karena seorang hero yang tidak dikenal. Sampai sekarang, tidak ada yang tahu siapa pembunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. Tetapi hal itu tidak masalah baginya, karena dia akan menghabisi semua hero yang ada di dunia.

---
Perang berakhir dengan kekalahan para villain. Sekarang dunia dikuasai oleh Hero yang korup. Dan Salah satu Hero tersebut membunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. dia tidak tahu yang mana, tapi tidak masalah. Jika dia membunuh satu per satu, mereka akan ada di antara mereka. Ehwa menjadi Hero killer, Villain yang memburu para Hero setiap malam. "Aku akan membunuh semua orang dan akan mengambil semuanya!"

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/hero-killer/list?title_no=3083)
description.it: Il mondo è in costante fermento, con continue guerre scoppiate tra eroi e cattivi. Dotata di abilità soprannaturali, una ragazza solitaria intraprende un percorso sanguinoso per vendicarsi contro le ingiustizie del mondo in cui vive. Con i continui scontri tra titani, nessuno è al sicuro. Se nessuno è disposto a proteggere gli innocenti, chi sono i veri eroi e chi sono i veri cattivi? Cosa separa veramente l'uno dall'altro?
description.ko:
전쟁은 빌런들의 패배로 막을 내렸다.
이제 세상은 부패한 히어로들이 지배하고 있다.
그리고, 그런 히어로들 중 하나가 이화의 언니를 죽였다.
언니를 죽인 게 누구인지는 모르지만 상관없다.
한 놈씩 죽이다 보면 그중에 있을 테니까.
이화는 매일 밤 영웅들을 사냥하는 빌런, 히어로 킬러가 된다.
​
한 악당의 지독한 액션 활극.
“모조리 죽이고, 빼앗아 주마!”
description.th:
เรื่องราวสงครามระหว่างเหล่าฮีโร่และวายร้ายได้จบลงด้วยชัยชนะของกลุ่มฮีโร่ แต่โลกในตอนนี้กลับปกครองด้วยกลุ่มฮีโร่ที่ฉ้อฉล และหนึ่งในฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นได้ฆาตกรรมพี่สาวของอีฮวา อีฮวาไม่รู้เลยว่าฮีโร่คนไหนที่ลงมือฆ่าพี่สาวของเธอ เธอเลยตัดสินใจไล่ฆ่าพวกฮีโร่ไปทีละคน เธอคิดว่าถ้าฆ่าพวกฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นให้หมด แล้วมันจะนำไปสู้การล้างแค้นให้พี่สาวเธอได้ การล้างแค้นของวายร้ายผู้สิ้นหวังได้เริ่มต้นขึ้น “ฉันจะฆ่าพวกแกทุกคน ฉันจะพรากทุกอย่างที่แกมีไปจากแก”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=2840)
description.zh-hk:
戰爭在反派的敗北下落幕了，而世界由腐敗的英雄們接手掌控。 然而，其中一個英雄殺了苡禾的姐姐。 她不在乎兇手是誰，反正把他們全部殺掉就可以了。 苡禾每晚都會行動，成為了英雄殺手的反派角色。 一個壞蛋的殘忍獵殺行動。「全部殺掉！全部搶走！」

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=5647)

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. 

High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

description.en: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~
An unexpected series of trials begin for a girl who was close to the bottom of the school hierarchy. The winner gets a prize!

title.en: Kimi ga Shinu Made Koi wo Shitai

altTitles.ja: きみが死ぬまで恋をしたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Love You Till Your Dying Day
My Wish Is To Fall In Love Until You Die

altTitles.ja: きみ死ぬ

altTitles.pl: Pragnę Cię kochać aż do Twej śmierci

altTitles.uk: Хочу кохати, допоки ти не вмерла

altTitles.id: Keinginanku Adalah Jatuh Cinta Sampai Kamu Mati

altTitles.th: เพียงได้รักตราบสิ้นลมหายใจ

altTitles.en: I want to love you until you die

description.en:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.
description.uk:
Десь на далекому закуточку світу між високих гір є одна дитяча школа-інтернат. Тут дітей ще з малого віку виховують, як магічно-військову зброю та гонять на війну заради країни. Будь-кого можуть відправили на поле бою в будь-який момент, а шанси вижити навіть у старанного учня – мізерні. Жорстока буденність, у якій немає місця для співчуття до загиблих товаришів.

Шіна – звичайна чотирнадцятирічна учениця цієї школи, серцю якої важко миритися з такою буденністю. Однієї ночі, вона зустріла в холі скривавлену дівчинку, яка щойно повернулася з бою – Мімі. Здавалося б, вони несумісні: Шіна не зносить тягаря оточуючої реальності та прагне мирного життя, а Мімі йде на війну з радісною посмішкою та повертається в крові подоланих ворогів. Проте разом проведений час та щире бажання зрозуміти один одного змогли навіки переплести їх долі, які тепер розлучить лиш смерть.

Це історія двох дівчат між смертю та коханням, які знайшли в цьому світі свою маленьку невинну мрію.

altTitles.ja: カラーレス

description.en:
A gray Earth, where humanity was transformed into deformed beings. The curtains open on an action series where the goal is to recover a lost world, with the help of a strange-looking gun!
 
An enormous solar flare caused the planet to lose all of its colors. Humans are deformed and declining in numbers. The key to reclaiming the old world lies within the power hidden in *color*, and one *girl*. Knowing that the few remnants of colors in the world yield a great power, Avidia, who is conducting research while protecting a girl named Chie, uses the colors to expand his own power, and throws himself in a battle against the Cult.

---
A cosmic disaster changed the Earth forever, stripping away every last drop of color from the world. Mankind also changed: the familiar human face is almost forgotten in a world now populated wholly by mutants. Against the backdrop of a moody urban landscape, a lone-wolf investigator named Avidia relies on both his wits and extraordinary gun to hunt down the world's last hidden scraps of color. He soon crosses paths with a very special girl -- one who just might hold the key to bringing back what the world has lost.
description.es:
Una Tierra gris, donde la humanidad se transformó en seres deformes. Se abren las cortinas de una serie de acción en la que el objetivo es recuperar un mundo perdido, con la ayuda de un arma de aspecto extraño.  
  
Una enorme erupción solar hizo que el planeta perdiera todos sus colores. Los humanos están deformados y disminuyendo en número. La clave para recuperar el viejo mundo está en el poder oculto en el 「color」, y en una「Chica」. Sabiendo que los pocos restos de colores en el mundo producen un gran poder, Avidia, que está llevando a cabo una investigación mientras protege a una chica llamada Chie, utiliza los colores para expandir su propio poder, y se lanza a una batalla contra el Culto.
description.fr: Suite à une éruption solaire d'une ampleur sans précédent, la Terre a perdu ses couleurs. L'humanité, victime de mutations génétiques, est sur le déclin. Malgré tout, il subsiste encore des fragments infimes de couleurs dans le monde, et ils pourraient bien être la clé qui rendra à la Terre sa splendeur d'antan, tout comme une mystérieuse jeune fille Avidya, qui étudie la prodigieuse énergie contenue dans les couleurs, va devoir mettre sa vie en jeu pour protéger la jeune Tchié de l'Église, un culte qui cherche à s'emparer de ce pouvoir pour étendre son influence.
description.ja:
『シドニアの騎士』『人形の国』弐瓶勉先生、絶賛!!
「心配になるぐらい人間が出てきませんが大好きです。」


灰色の地球、
異形化が進んだ人類ーー。
失われた世界を取り戻す
異形ガンアクション、開幕!!

極大太陽フレアの影響で色素を失った地球。
異形化し、衰退の一途をたどる人類。
かつての世界を取り戻す鍵は
「色」に秘められた力と一人の「少女」。

世界に僅かに残された「色」の残滓に
巨大な力が宿っていることを知り
研究を進めるアヴィディアは、
少女・智慧を守りながら
「色」の力を使い勢力を拡大する
「教団」との戦いに身を投じることとなる。
description.pt:
Uma Terra cinza, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. As cortinas abrem-se em uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de estranha aparência.  
  
Uma enorme erupção solar fez o planeta perder todas as suas cores. Humanos estão deformados e declinando em números. A chave para reaver o velho mundo reside no poder escondido na “cor”, e uma “garota”. Sabendo que os poucos resquícios de cores no mundo carregam um grande poder, Avidia, que está investigando enquanto protege uma garota de nome Chie, usa as cores para expandir seu próprio poder, e se atira em uma batalha contra O Culto.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KKreptilian)
description.uk:
Сіра земля, на якій людство перетворилося на понівечених істот. Мета полягає в тому, щоб відновити втрачений світ за допомогою химерної зброї!

Потужний сонячний спалах змусив планету втратити всі свої кольори. Тіла людей сильно деформувалися, і їхня чисельність поступово падає. Ключем до відновлення старого світу є сила, прихована у "кольорі" та "дівчині". Авідія, який вивчає факт знаходження величезної сили в залишках "кольору", принагідно використовуючи її задля захисту дівчини на ім'я Чіє та розширення своєї сили, зійшовся у запеклій битві проти "культу".
description.pt-br:
Uma Terra cinzenta, onde a humanidade foi transformada em seres deformados. Abrem-se as cortinas de uma série de ação onde o objetivo é recuperar um mundo perdido, com a ajuda de uma arma de aspeto estranho!
 
Uma enorme erupção solar fez com que o planeta perdesse todas as suas cores. Os humanos estão deformados e a diminuir em número. A chave para recuperar o velho mundo está no poder escondido na *cor* e numa *menina*. Sabendo que os poucos restos de cores no mundo geram um grande poder, Avidia, que está a fazer pesquisa enquanto protege uma rapariga chamada Chie, usa as cores para expandir o seu próprio poder e lança-se numa batalha contra o Culto.

---
Uma catástrofe cósmica mudou a Terra para sempre, retirando do mundo até à última gota de cor. A humanidade também mudou: o rosto humano familiar está quase esquecido num mundo agora totalmente povoado por mutantes. Tendo como pano de fundo uma paisagem urbana sombria, um investigador solitário chamado Avidia confia na sua inteligência e na sua extraordinária arma para caçar os últimos restos de cor escondidos no mundo. Ele logo se cruza com uma garota muito especial - uma que pode ser a chave para trazer de volta o que o mundo perdeu.

description.en: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

title.en: Monster Onna Kanbu wa Osanaki Yuusha wo Dekiaisuru

altTitles.ja: モンスター女幹部は幼き勇者を溺愛する

altTitles.en: Monster Female Executive Dotes on Young Heroes

altTitles.ru: Девушка-монстр-руководитель по уши влюбилась в юного героя

description.en: When a young hero appears, Arachne is ordered to hunt him down, and is moved by the hero's attitude and falls in love with him. On the contrary, she wants to use the power of the young hero to become the strongest demon... A reversal story of Arachne and the young hero who were trying to entangle each other but were entangled in love!?
description.ja:
幼勇者の出現で追討を命じられたアラクネはその勇者の態度から情にほだされ惚れてしまう。
逆に幼勇者の力を利用して魔族最強の地位を望むように...。
絡め獲るつもりが恋心に絡めとられたアラクネと幼勇者の逆転成り上がりストーリー!?
description.ru: Однажды внезапно появился могущественный владыка демонов. Люди были напуганы, и отправили героя сразить его. Прознав об этом, владыка демонов приказал арахне убить его, но она была тронута отношением героя к ней и влюбляется в него. Теперь же, она хочет использовать силу героя, чтобы стать самым сильным демоном... Так начинается история трагической любви арахны и героя в темном фэнтэзи

description.en:
‘Less than a month old… I became the great empire’s treasured princess…!’
In all my life, I wanted love. Love from my family, But the family I had, failed me in the end. Abandoned… abused… I don’t want this so-called family. It’s a waste of time.
I came to a new world after a miserable ending…
‘The empire’s treasured princess… that’s me… but why is father, the emperor, so strange?’
“Mabel, I will give you the Ponce Castle.”
“My sweet child, the most fertile land is yours.”
“No, wait, this whole country will be yours for the plucking.”
‘Father, he’s strange… is this what family love is like?
description.ru:
Мне 1 год, а меня уже называют Императрицей этой Империи?!
Когда я открыла глаза, поняла, что переродилась в истории с печальным концом в семье, где не может быть согласия или любящих родителей. Я переродилась принцессой!

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

altTitles.ja: 弱虫ペダル

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

title.en: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

title.en: Fate/Grand Order Anthology Comics STAR RELIGHT

altTitles.en: Fate／Grand Order アンソロジーコミック STAR RELIGHT

altTitles.ja: 平成ハレンチ学園

description.en:
Modern-era remake/alternative future of the infamous Harenchi Gakuen.

Yamagishi and Fukurokoji fresh from University are starting as the first male teachers in the prestigious girls' Harenochi school. Sure enough, like the predecessor "Harenchi Gakuen", the school isn't lacking in perverted teachers and students.

This manga was also adapted into OVA of the same name [animenewsnetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9972)
